alert.note: Alert for North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 3:20AM PST until February 01 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snowfall accumulations of 7 to 14 inches for most roadways, elevations above 5500 feet could see accumulations up to 3 feet. South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Areas of Siskiyou County at and above 4000 feet, including ridgelines in the Siskiyou Mountain Range and higher terrain around Mount Shasta. Affected roadways include Highway 89 near Snowmans Summit and Highway 3 south of Callahan. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will occur late this afternoon through this evening. Snow will mostly occur above 4000 feet, but high snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible late this afternoon through this evening which could bring snow levels down to around 3500 feet on Interstate 5. Winter weather impacts like poor visibility and snow on roads are why elevations below 4000 feet were included despite our expectation that accumulations will be limited. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. Do not detour during winter storms. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is likely and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
